descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
1) Charles Mills (1997). The Racial Contract. Cornell University Press. ISBN: 978-0-8014-8463-6.
2) Linda Darling Hammond (2010). The Flat World and Education: How America's Commitment to Equity Will Determine Our Future. Teachers College Press. ISBN: 978-0-8077-4962-3
3) James Anderson (1988). The Education of Blacks in the South 1865 - 1930. University of North Carolina Press. ISBN: 0-8078-4221-4
4) Ta-Nehisi Coates (2015). Between the World and Me. NY: Spiegel & Grau. ISBN: 978-0-8129-9354-7
5) Roxanne Dunbar-Ortiz (2014). An Indigenous Peoples' History of the United States. Boston: Beacon Press. ISBN: 978-0-8070-0040-3
6) Ward Churchill (2004). Kill the Indian, Save the Man: The Genocidal Impact of American Indian Residential Schools. City Lights Publishers. ISBN: 0-87286-434-0
